SettingsPage.title: Privacy & Transparency
SettingsPage.description:
Locally Loop is a privacy-first productivity app. There are no backend servers, accounts, or analytics. All your data, sessions, logs, and audio,
stays “on device” until you choose to share.
Only the text you type, plus a minimal context snippet, goes directly from your browser to the LLM provider you select.

modelProvider.title: Model Provider
modelProvider.description: Choose where your prompts are processed. Select OpenAI for hosted inference or point to your own self-hosted LLM endpoint to keep everything under your control.

voiceInput.title: Voice Input
voiceInput.description:
Control what happens to raw audio recordings after transcription. On opt-in voice records are stored locally for listening them again later.
If you want to see your records in your timeline(on device), opt it in

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Share anonymous logs to help. No personal data is included and helps developers improve this project. Default: Off.

SettingsPage.footer: No servers. No telemetry. Full privacy. Always local.
